description: This file defines the GameState entity class which models the current state of a game in a room, including the board state in JSON format, current turn, last dice roll, and update timestamp. It is part of the backend data persistence layer, using JPA annotations for ORM mapping.

classes.name: GameState
classes.description: Entity class representing the game state stored in the database for a specific room, including board state, current turn, last dice roll, and timestamp.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier of the game state.

methods.name: getBoardStateJson
methods.description: Returns the JSON string representing the board state.

methods.name: setBoardStateJson
methods.description: Sets the JSON string representing the board state.

methods.name: getCurrentTurnColor
methods.description: Returns the color of the player whose turn it is.

methods.name: setCurrentTurnColor
methods.description: Sets the color of the player whose turn it is.

methods.name: getUpdatedAt
methods.description: Returns the timestamp of last update.
